mapper.insert: insert into [realestateletter].[dbo].[COMMON_CODE] (code_group, code_value, code_name, code_description, reg_date) values (#{codeGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{codeValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{codeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{codeDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONVERT(CHAR(19), getdate(), 20))
mapper.select: select code_group, code_value, code_name, code_description, reg_date from [realestateletter].[dbo].[COMMON_CODE] order by reg_date desc
